评论详情: If you don’t have a a fuller bust it should be fine but if you do it will not be baggy and loose at all and does not go down to the tops of thighs

You all need to take that photo of the blue and gray sweater down. That is not what you are selling. I wish I read the reviews before buying this thin garbage you are trying to pass off as the one in image.
NOTHING LIKE THE PICTURE. VERY FLAT DID NOT LIKE IT AT ALL

评论概述: Very cute but runs small on boys and looks different than the picture
评论详情: This is a crazy cute and warm sweater and I love wearing it but I should warn people that it seems to run small. I'm a femboy who is about 5'7" and 135 lbs, so not a large person by any means, but this sweater's sleeves are a bit short on me. The band on the bottom looks a little different than the pic, too, but I don't mind. Girls should have no issue, but for me the main issue is the sleeve length.
It’s really cute, but it is kind of itchy. I have sensitive skin and this bothers me so I really don’t wear it much.

This sweater in the picture looks baggy and thick and fluffy. The sweater received was thin and flat. Its large but it is not at all what i was expecting to get based on the picture and item description. Very disappointed.
My daughter is very pleased with this sweater.
Nice sweater!! Made nice and delivered quickly. Gave it to my granddaughter for her birthday. She loved it. (She did pick it out!!)

i love this sweater even though it’s a one size fits all. it is nice material and baggy. it’s not too thick but it will keep you pretty warm, and it was worth every penny. looks absolutely amazing on as well. it’s a bit itchy but not unbearable.

It fits me ok at 5'7", average build.  It is a little wide, but the sleeves are just barely long enough.  It is definitely not oversized.  The person in the picture must be a VERY tiny person, to make this "one size" garment seem so large.  The colors are not as bright as the picture depicts.  I'm not returning it, but the photos and description are very misleading.

I had been hesitating to buy this sweater for a long time because it is listed as "one size." I normally wear a size L in tops and was not sure that the sweater would fit with the oversized look in the picture. Well, I finally decided to buy it and I love it! I bought the blue and grey striped sweater and I wear it at least three times a week. It fits even me oversized. My only regret is waiting so long to buy it. It is not as fuzzy as in the picture but that does not bother me.
The sweater was short, small, and uncomfortable.
ordered for my youngest who is a women's size small. She it oversized like the picture and it fit her as desired. Obviously it will fit different depending on size and body shape.
Very cute and comfortable.
My new fav sweater

评论概述: Daughter loves this - says it ts super comfy
评论详情: Looks great - holds up in the wash no problem (colors, too). If you have an aspiring little grunge kid, buy it.
It doesn’t look like the picture they are selling, yes it’s a stripped sweater with the colors showing but the material and fabric it’s not as portrayed and is not worth the money
I have no complaints for this sweater. It fits perfectly and is so comfortable. By far my favorite sweater I own.

评论概述: Shrunk and has a hole in it
评论详情: My daughter got this for Christmas. She’s worn it a handful of times. It has a hole in it after washing. I would not recommend.

What is pictured is the “sweater” my daughter received. While it looks nice and is considered oversized for her, it is not at all what was pictured that we purchased. I would not have spent the money on the what we received, should have been half the cost.

I got a size large absolutely love it and I'm ordering more now lol so soft and fits great but  ordering the net size up  a bit smaller then what I was hoping for but still looks amazing and love the colors 🤩🤩🤩🤩

评论概述: Images may be smaller than they appear...  lol
评论详情: Should have listened to reviews but took a chance, I'm 5'6", 133 lbs, this sweater was above my butt, they are way short.  Material not fuzzy looking, but soft.

One size fits all is NOT TRUE!  The arms are small and the picture makes it APPEAR to be oversized when it reality is not!  I am so disappointed in it!  The model must be a toothpick for it to be THIS BIG on her!  I ordered for Xmas and it arrived on 12/21 & wanted to find a replacement but it wouldn't be here in time for Xmas. So, she will open it and wonder why I ordered something so small for her!:(

评论概述: Not Big And Cozy As Pictured
评论详情: I expected this to be big and cozy, but the material is significantly more thin than it appears in the photo. I’m 5’5”, 160lbs and this fit me loosely, but not as loosely as it shows in the picture. For example, if I hypothetically wear a Medium, the sweater fit like a Large.
I really like this sweater, it’s oversized but still flattering. I really like the feel of it too, it’s soft and doesn’t scratch or itch!
A different material than what’s in the photo, not as soft as it seems in the photo. However really good quality still and comfortable. Size up a size or two!

评论概述: Shrinks to toddler size after first wash
评论详情: Itchy material, literally shocks your skin all over because of how staticky it is. Wash it once and dry it and it will turn into a toddlers sweater.
I find this sweater to be oversized, for me.... I am 5' 3" and about108 lbs and this fits as described.  It is not huge but it is far larger than others record in their reviews

I was really disappointed with the material. I thought it would be fuzzy like the photo but it’s flat and very synthetic looking—almost shiny. I washed it hoping it would help but it didn’t. I usually wear a small in sweaters and this fit but I wouldn’t consider it oversized, which is what I wanted. Glad it was cheap so at least I didn’t waste too much money.

This is not "one size fits all" and is smaller than the listed size chart, which says: OneSize: Length 69cm/27.2" Bust 130cm/51.2" Sleeve 46cm/18.1". The actual sweater measures 23.75 long, bust 45.4, and sleeve 17 inches.

It looks like a nice, comfy, oversized sweater but it did not even fit a size small female. Sleeves were extremely short and it's not baggy at all. And it's a "one sized fits all" so I couldn't get a bigger size. Extremely disappointing.
Pour sortir les poubelles
This is not oversized! On average I wear a small top. This sweater was made for a 10 year old, and still would not be oversized!

Not only did it take forever to arrive, when it did it looks like it will fit a 13 year old not a full grown person. It is also nothing like the picture. It is NOT an oversized big fluffy sweater, it is a thin shirt with fitted neck, arms and waist. Super not impressed!
My daughter loves this jumper and wears it all the time.
Item is not as big as in photo . This is only a Medium sized sweater

Excelente inversión, tal como muestra la foto. 👍🏻 mi único inconveniente fue que estuvo retenido el paquete en aduana bastante tiempo, pero hablando del producto es tal como se muestra en la foto, cómodo y calientito🤗

评论用户: It was way too small, turtle neck, super thin, and not even the right colour. Not worth the money for sure.
评论详情: Super thin, came in the wrong size, had a turtleneck that I didn’t know it came with, and it was very off colour. Don’t recommend

This “oversized” sweater may be oversized for a 6 year old!!  Bought for my slim , 13 year old.  Super tiny sweater!  When requested refund was offered 30% of the cost because shipping.  Then they ghosted me.  Had to go through Amazon customer service for help.

3XL is about size 14 --tight all over, short -- like a bomber jacket length. Sleeves are tight. Grey and blue striped and soft knit,  BUt eerything else about it is "not as advertised".  NOthing about this is "oversized".

This is described as oversized and the model appears to be swimming in a very large sweater. But when it arrived we saw that it’s actually tiny, more like a ladies small and for some reason the sleeves are very short.
Picture is deceiving
